metadata.synopsis: Cinematic Cutscene with the character using a ladder to get from the Goblin Camp to the Underdark
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. in recon oe UND_TransitionCinematic_ClimbDown4. ReCon: "oe und_cine_reset" -  this will allow to see the cinematic again when clicking on the ladder (by default the game shows it only once)
